name: Spicy Chicken Stir-Fry
description: A flavorful and quick stir-fry with chicken, vegetables, and spicy sauce.

description: A refreshing pasta salad packed with colorful vegetables and tangy dressing.

description: Juicy grilled salmon fillets served with a zesty lemon herb sauce.

description: A vibrant salsa made with fresh mangoes, avocados, and tangy lime juice.

description: A rich and creamy risotto made with Arborio rice and flavorful mushrooms.

description: Tender shrimp cooked in a tangy lemon garlic sauce with butter and herbs.

description: A hearty and nutritious chili made with quinoa, beans, and vegetables.

description: Delicious homemade pizza with your choice of toppings and gooey melted cheese.
